CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Course_Name__c) == 'BTech', (Rpl_Sem_1_CGPA__c + Rpl_Sem_2_CGPA__c + Rpl_Sem_3_CGPA__c + Rpl_Sem_4_CGPA__c + Rpl_Sem_5_CGPA__c + Rpl_Sem_6_CGPA__c + Rpl_Sem_7_CGPA__c + Rpl_Sem_8_CGPA__c) / 8 / 10, IF( TEXT(Course_Name__c) == 'UG', (Rpl_Sem_1_CGPA__c + Rpl_Sem_2_CGPA__c + Rpl_Sem_3_CGPA__c + Rpl_Sem_4_CGPA__c + Rpl_Sem_5_CGPA__c + Rpl_Sem_6_CGPA__c) / 6 / 10, IF( OR(TEXT(Course_Name__c) == 'MBA', TEXT(Course_Name__c) == 'MTech/MSC/MCA'), Rpl_UG_CGPA__c /10, 0 ) ) )
CustomField.label: UG OverAll Percentage1
